title: Cleaning up conference leftovers
body_html:
Related issue: backlog: #775 (comment)

After the Grand Conferences Makeover of team RailsGyn and the new workflow for conferences, there are some leftovers that we don't use anymore.

  • Removed unused database fields in conferences table (accomodation, flights, round)
  • Updated seeds, factories, conference_params accordingly
  • Removed unused method re: conferences
  • Moved a single helper method to the existing bunch of helper methods in application_helper.rb
  • Removed lib/conf with all the raffle logic
body_text:

body:
Related issue: backlog: https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/pull/775#discussion_r125868436

After the Grand Conferences Makeover of team RailsGyn and the new workflow for conferences, there are some leftovers that we don't use anymore.

- _Removed_ unused database fields in `conferences` table (accomodation, flights, round)
- _Updated_ seeds, factories, conference_params accordingly
- _Removed_ unused method re: conferences
- _Moved_ a single helper method to the existing bunch of helper methods in application_helper.rb
- _Removed_ lib/conf with all the raffle logic
